profile.header: 卷筒纸胶印，美国标准 (SWOP) 到改良 LWC
profile.explanation: 从 SWOP 2006 Grade 3 卷筒涂层纸到改良 PSO LWC (ECI) 的转换 (LWC 纸, 最高油墨覆盖 300%)

profile.header: Web offset, US (SWOP) to LWC improved
profile.explanation: Conversion from Web Coated SWOP 2006 Grade 3 Paper to PSO LWC improved (ECI) (LWC paper, max. 300% ink coverage)

profile.header: Offset de bobina, de EE.UU. (SWOP) a LWC improved
profile.explanation: Conversión de papel grado 3 SWOP 2006 estucado en bobina a PSO LWC improved (ECI) (papel estucado ligero, cobertura de tinta 300% máxima)

profile.header: Impression rotative offset, USA (SWOP) vers LWC improved
profile.explanation: Conversion de la Web Coated SWOP 2006 Grade 3 Paper vers PSO LWC improved (ECI) (papier couché léger, couverture d'encre de 300% max.)
Konvertierung von Web Coated SWOP 2006 Grade 3 Paper nach PSO LWC improved (ECI) (Heatset, LWC-Papier, max. 300% Gesamtfarbauftrag)

profile.header: Offset bobina, da US (SWOP) a LWC improved
profile.explanation: Conversione da Web Coated SWOP 2006 Grade 3 Paper a PSO LWC improved (ECI) (carta LWC, max. 300% di copertura inchiostro)

profile.header: Web オフセット, 米国 (SWOP) を改善された LWC に変換
profile.explanation: Web Coated SWOP 2006 Grade 3 Paper を PSO LWC improved (ECI) (LWC 紙, インキ総量 300%)
